TopicTitle: "Gone to Space in Sixty Seconds" Need a quick getaway after your Great Snack Robbery? Try this craft

Articles.Content:
This is a quick 1 minute plus video showing a improvized linear aerospike test vehicle going sub-orbital after the shock and awe of a Zero-Length ramp launch. This variant of the "Hyper V" test vehicle is the first to attain orbit, after shedding jet engines and associated plumbing in exchange for a heavier fuel load.

In the true spirit of "El Cheapo Aerospace", the "GhettoSpike" is made from stock engine nozzles in a linear array and offers all the good looks of an aerospike engine without the efficiency gains!
